Distribution. Eastern Palaearctic [ China : Anhui , Henan , Hubei , Jiangsu , Jilin , Liaoning , Shandong ]; Oriental [ China ( Fujian , Guangdong , Guangxi , Guizhou , Hainan , Hunan , Hong Kong , Jiangxi, Sichuan, Taiwan , Yunnan, Zhejiang); India , Japan , Malaysia , Nepal , Pakistan , Philippines , Sri Lanka , Vietnam ].
